content: Ok, this is close to perfect, just add one thing to the bullets in football training, physicality, he needs to learn to give and take a hit like no other, like Richard Sherman, Derrick Henry, mccaffrey, Edelman, ray lewis, LT or whoever you want to list. I have full pads and so does he, he has to know he has to just not give a fuck about pain and that he is going to become so hardcore. It will be brutal and hurt, but it’s totally worth it and required.
